TITLE: Episode 39 - Red Pill of the Week: The Sinful Messiah
DESCRIPTION: For this Red Pill of the Week, we take a look at who David Koresh was, what the Branch Davidians believed, and what happened inside of Mount Carmel before the ATF stormed the gates on February 28th, 1993.
